member.name: T:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea
member.summary: This is the common interface for both the Windows Forms and the web server control image area types

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea.AccessKey
member.summary: This is used to get or set the access key (a shortcut key or mnemonic) for the image area

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea.Coordinates
member.summary: This is used to get or set the coordinate values in string form

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea.DrawFocusFrame(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: This is used to get the shape to draw a focus frame around itself
member.param: The graphics object to use for drawing.
A point used to offset the image area coordinates (i.e. if the image is scrolled).

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea.Enabled
member.summary: This is used to get or set the enabled state of the image area

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea.ImageAreaChanged
member.summary: This event is raised when an image area property changes that affects its visual presentation in the image map control such as its position or enabled state.

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea.Shape
member.summary: This read-only property is used to get the shape type

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea.TabIndex
member.summary: This is used to get or set the tab index of the image area

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea.Tag
member.summary: This is used to get or set an object that contains additional user-defined data for the image area

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea.ToolTip
member.summary: This is used to get or set the tool tip for the image area

member.name: T:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageMap
member.summary: This interface defines events, properties, and methods common to both the Windows Forms and the web server control image map classes.

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageMap.Areas
member.summary: This returns the collection of areas defined for the image map

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageMap.Click
member.summary: This event is raised when a hot spot on the image map is clicked

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageMap.ImageMapHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the image in the image map control in pixels

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageMap.ImageMapWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the image in the image map control in pixels

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageMap.ToolTip
member.summary: Gets or sets the tool tip text displayed for all undefined areas of the image

member.name: T:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaCollection
member.summary: A type-safe collection of objects

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaCollection.#ctor(EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageMap)
member.summary: Construct an empty collection associated with the specified control
member.param: The image map control that owns the collection

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaCollection.#ctor(EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageMap,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea})
member.summary: Construct a collection from an enumerable list of objects
member.param: The image map control that owns the collection
An enumerable list of objects to add

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaCollection.AddRange(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea})
member.summary: Add a range of objects from an enumerable list
member.param: An enumerable list of objects to add

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaCollection.ClearItems
member.summary: This is overridden to notify the image map that all of the image areas have been removed

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaCollection.ImageAreaChanged
member.summary: This event is raised when an image area property changes that affects its visual presentation in the image map control such as its position or enabled state.

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaCollection.ImageMapControl
member.summary: This property is used to get the control that uses this collection. Its primary use is by the ImageAreaCoordinateEditor designer class so that it can get the image information it needs at design time.

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaCollection.InsertItem(System.Int32,EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea)
member.summary: This is overridden to notify the image map that a new image area has been added to the collection
member.param: The position at which the object is inserted

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaCollection.RemoveItem(System.Int32)
member.summary: This is overridden to notify the image map that an image area has been removed from the collection
member.param: The position at which the object is removed

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaCollection.SetItem(System.Int32,EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea)
member.summary: This is overridden to notify the image map that a new image area has replaced another in the collection.
member.param: The position at which the object is stored

member.name: T:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaShape
member.summary: This enumerated type defines the various image area shapes

member.name: F:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaShape.Rectangle
member.summary: A rectangle (web and Windows Forms)

member.name: F:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaShape.Circle
member.summary: A circle (web and Windows Forms)

member.name: F:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaShape.Polygon
member.summary: A polygon (web and Windows Forms)

member.name: F:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageAreaShape.Ellipse
member.summary: An ellipse (Windows Forms only)

member.summary: This is a custom event arguments class for the event

member.summary: Constructor
member.param: The index of the clicked area
The X coordinate of the click
The Y coordinate of the click

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageMapClickEventArgs.AreaIndex
member.summary: This read-only property is used to get the zero-based index of the area that was clicked

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageMapClickEventArgs.XCoordinate
member.summary: This read-only property is used to get the X coordinate of the click

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageMapClickEventArgs.YCoordinate
member.summary: This read-only property is used to get the Y coordinate of the click

member.summary: Default constructor

member.summary: Add a range of objects from an enumerable list
member.param: An enumerable list of objects to add

member.name: T:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.AreaClickAction
member.summary: This enumerated type defines the action to take when an area is clicked in the Windows Forms control.

member.name: F:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.AreaClickAction.FireEvent
member.summary: Fire the image map event and the image area event.

member.name: F:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.AreaClickAction.None
member.summary: Displays a if one is specified but performs no action.

member.name: T:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawImageEventArgs
member.summary:
This is a custom event arguments class for the
event.

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawImageEventArgs.#ctor(System.Drawing.Graphics,EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawState,System.Drawing.Point,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: The drawing state of the item
A flag indicating whether or not to draw the focus rectangle on return

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawImageEventArgs.DrawFocus
member.summary: This property is used to get or set whether the image map should draw the default focus frame around the active image area.

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawImageEventArgs.DrawState
member.summary: This property is used to get or set the state of the item to draw

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawImageEventArgs.Graphics
member.summary: This read-only property is used to get the graphics context for drawing

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawImageEventArgs.ImageOffset
member.summary: This read-only property is used to get the image offset

member.name: T:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawState
member.summary: This enumerated type defines the drawing states for the image map and the image areas when their OwnerDraw property is set to true.

member.name: F:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawState.Normal
member.summary: The item currently has no special state

member.name: F:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawState.Disabled
member.summary: The item is disabled

member.name: F:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawState.Focus
member.summary: The item has the focus

member.name: F:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawState.HotLight
member.summary: The item is being hot-tracked (highlighted as the mouse pointer passes over it)

member.name: T:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase
member.summary: This is the abstract base class for the image area types of the Windows Forms control.

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: This version of the constructor takes a tool tip
member.param: The tool tip to associate with the image area

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.AccessKey
member.summary: This is used to get or set the access key (a shortcut key or mnemonic) for the image area
member.exception: The specified access key is not a single character string.

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.Action
member.summary: This defines the action to take when the area is clicked

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.Click
member.summary: This event is raised when the image area is clicked

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.Coordinates
member.summary: This must be overridden to provide the image area coordinates

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.DoubleClick
member.summary: This event is raised when the image area is double-clicked

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.DrawFocusFrame(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: This must be overridden to get the shape to draw a focus frame around itself
member.param: The graphics object to use for drawing.
A point used to offset the image area coordinates (i.e. if the image is scrolled).

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.DrawImage
member.summary: This event is raised when owner draw mode is enabled and the image area needs to be drawn

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.Enabled
member.summary: This is used to enable or disable the area

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.Enter
member.summary: This event is raised when the image area gains the focus

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: This is overridden to allow proper comparison of image area objects.
member.param: The object to which this instance is compared
member.returns: Returns true if the object equals this instance, false if it does not

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.GetHashCode
member.summary: Get a hash code for the image area object
member.returns: Returns the hash code for the image area's string form

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.ImageAreaChanged
member.summary: This event is raised when an image area property changes that affects its visual presentation in the image map control such as its position or enabled state.

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.Leave
member.summary: This event is raised when the image area loses the focus

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.MouseDown
member.summary: This event is raised when a mouse button is pressed while the mouse is inside the image area

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.MouseEnter
member.summary: This event is raised when the mouse enters the image area

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.MouseHover
member.summary: This event is raised when the mouse remains stationary inside the image area for an amount of time

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.MouseLeave
member.summary: This event is raised when the mouse leaves the image area

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.MouseMove
member.summary: This event is raised when the mouse moves in the image area

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageAreaBase.MouseUp
member.summary: This event is raised when a mouse button is released while the mouse is inside the image area

member.summary: This must be overridden to provide the image area shape

member.summary: This is used to get or set an object that contains additional user-defined data for the image area

member.summary: This is used to get or set the tool tip to display when the mouse hovers over the area

member.name: T:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap
member.summary: This is a derived class that can be used to display an image map (an image with clickable hot spots).

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.Areas
member.summary: This returns the collection of areas defined for the image map

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.CenterImage
member.summary: This property is used to get or set whether or not the control will center the image in the client area.

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.Click
member.summary: This event is raised when a hot spot on the image map is clicked

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.Cursor
member.summary: This is used to get or set the cursor shown when the mouse is not over a defined image area

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.DoubleClick
member.summary: This event is raised when a hot spot on the image map is double-clicked

member.name: E:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.DrawImage
member.summary: This event is raised when owner draw mode is enabled and the image map needs to be drawn

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.Focus(EWSoftware.ImageMaps.IImageArea,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method can be used to set the focus to a specific image area
member.param: The image area to which focus is given
Specify true to make the image map the focused control, false to leave the focus alone.

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.Focus(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method can be used to set the focus to a specific image area index
member.param: The index of the image area to which focus is given
Specify true to make the image map the focused control, false to leave the focus alone.

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.FocusedArea
member.summary: This property is used to get or set the index of the area that has the focus

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.Image
member.summary: This is used to get or set the image to display in the image map control

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.ImageAreaCursor
member.summary: This property is used to get or set the cursor shown when the mouse is over a defined image area

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.ImageMapHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the image in the image map control in pixels

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.ImageMapWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the image in the image map control in pixels

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.MouseArea
member.summary: This read-only property is used to get the index of the area that the mouse is over

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnClick(EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageMapClickEventArgs)
member.summary: This raises the image map event

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnClick(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to raise the image map click event when a defined image area is clicked

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnDoubleClick(EWSoftware.ImageMaps.ImageMapClickEventArgs)
member.summary: This raises the image map event

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnDoubleClick(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to raise the image map double-click event when a defined image area is double-clicked.

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnDrawImage(EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.DrawImageEventArgs)
member.summary: This raises the image map event

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnEnabledChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to enable or disable animation when the control's enabled state changes

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to repaint the control and select the appropriate image area as the active one when the control gains focus.

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnLostFocus(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to repaint the control when it loses focus

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to raise the event in the image area under the mouse if there is one

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnMouseHover(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to raise the event in the image area under the mouse if there is one

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnMouseMove(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to adjust the display as the mouse moves in and out of defined areas on the image map and to fire the appropriate image area mouse events.

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to raise the event in the image area under the mouse if there is one

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to display the image map

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnParentChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to enable or disable animation when the control's parent changes

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to invalidate the display when resized

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnStyleChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to adjust the control layout when the control style changes

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OnVisibleChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This is overridden to enable or disable animation when the control's visible state changes

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.OwnerDraw
member.summary: This is used to turn owner draw mode on and off

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)
member.summary: This is overridden to fire the image map click event if an image area has the focus and the Space bar or Enter key is pressed.
member.returns: True if handled, false if not

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: This is overridden to handle arrow keys in the same manner as a Tab key press
member.returns: True if the key was processed, false if not

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.ProcessMnemonic(System.Char)
member.summary: This is overridden to handle processing of image area access keys
member.returns: True if handled, false if not

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.ProcessTabKey(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This is overridden to handle tabbing through the image areas
member.param: True if tabbing forward through the areas or false if tabbing backwards through them.
member.returns: True if the next image area is selected or false if there is not one to go to (i.e. the start or end of the image areas is reached).

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.RefreshAreaInformation
member.summary: This method is used to notify the image map that its image area collection has been modified in some way and that it should refresh its internal area markers.

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.SizeToImage
member.summary: This property is used to get or set whether or not the control will resize itself to show the entire image if possible if the image is larger than its current size or shrink its size to fit the image if the image is smaller than its current size.

member.name: P:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.ToolTip
member.summary: This is used to get or set the tool tip text displayed for all undefined areas of the image

member.name: M:EWSoftware.ImageMaps.Windows.Forms.ImageMap.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)
member.summary: This is overridden to invalidate the client area so that the control is redrawn correctly when scrolled.
